page.title: 06TRANSPORT
page.content: The Motorway is called the M69. It comes from Coventry and it goes to Leicester It is short because it links the M1 with the M6. It goes under 13 bridges from Coventry to Leicester,6 of which are in this area.The Motorway cuts accccross the area dividing it into a quarter in the east and three quarters in the west, and it travels from north - east to south. The Motorway has caused problems for farmers in getting machinery across it because they have land on both sides. Tunnels have been built under the motorway to try to solve this problem. On the day of our survvey the traffic wasn't excessive. Over half the vehicles were carsss, and approximately two fifths were lorries and vans. More traffic was going from Coventry to Leicester than the other way.
